subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Almost everything about the N.H.L. is long, but it took only 17 seconds for the Blackhawks to write history, and wrap up the Stanley Cup, against the Bruins.
snippet: Almost everything about the N.H.L. is long, but it took only 17 seconds for the Blackhawks to write history, and wrap up the Stanley Cup, against the Bruins.
